root.name: TNA Wrestling iMPACT!
root.description: OverviewTNA Wrestling iMPACT! is a wrestling game developed by Bight Games and published by Namco Networks America for the iPhone, iPad, and Android platforms.Other Mobile Phone VersionsTutorial image from the 2D mobile phone version.TNA Wrestling iMPACT! was also released on Java, BREW, and Blackberry mobile phone platforms. These releases differed from the iPhone, iPad, and Android versions in that they are 2D rather than 3D.
